name: jlowe424
text:
I think we're all overlooking one little thing:

How exactly was Phillipe practicing for the saddest thing? Google image search?

name: tekende

name: philosophe
text: rotten.com

name: edthehead
text: Your avatar makes the post.

name: soticoto
text:
Have you never played Google Seppuku?

You type in two words in order to find something that makes you wish you'd never been born.
Simple as.
And trust me... I've seen some pretty bad sh!t. You haven't really known horror until you've seen a close-up, high-res photo of a poodle's vadge with STDs.

name: dasilodavi
text: That sounds familiar.  Didn't they do this on Ghastly's Ghastly Comic?

name: soticoto
text:
Dunno. Never heard of it.
I just came across the Google Seppuku Livejournal community one day, joined up and joined in.

I also saw many pictures of parasitic insect parts and pussy tumours.

name: budenhagen
text: Now when you say pussy, do you mean pus-y, kitty cancer, or indeed tumors on the female parts?
